_comment: This json file contains mixtures. Mixtures are comprised of several materials. Dilutions of materials are considered to be mixtures.

mixtures.name: Heliotropex N
mixtures.scent: Exotic floral characteristic with sweet, balsamic and spicy undertones. Has nuances of almond and berries.
mixtures.usage: An economical substitute for Heliotropin when used at 15% dilution.

mixtures.name: Coumarex DB
mixtures.scent: Sweet, balsam, coumarin, fruity, tobacco, hay, woody, nutty, tonka.
mixtures.usage: Hay note, tobacco builder, tonka builder. A perfect match with almond and vanilla notes and useful in gourmand accords.

mixtures.name: Orris Givco
mixtures.scent: Floral, orris butter and violet scent.
mixtures.usage: Extremely diffusive orris and violet builder.

mixtures.name: Benzoin Oliffac
mixtures.scent: Boozy, sweet, smooth, balsam, and vanilla nuances.
